page.title: 19Cropwell Bishop Primary
page.content: Cropwell Bishop has a modern Primary school.It was built approximately{ {15}years ago. The old school,still standing, is situated on the opposite side of the road from Manor Farm but a bit farther down. It closed down because the new school had better facilities.Our school has a{playing {field.It also has}two{play-courts for {younger and older}children.The play-courts each have a climbing frame.We also have{six}classrooms.a dining room,a hall and a library.We also have school kitchens.We have a head-mistress now.But we used to have a head master.But{Mr.Baker retired 2 {years ago}.He had been working here 19 years.We have had {three}new teachers since Mr. Baker left.When Miss Glover,the Deputy,retired she had been working here nearly 20 years. Author:{Louise Askey; aged 11 years.}
